title: What is the best factual and accurate biography on what is known about the true story of Hannibal Barca? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s an old book and not specifically a biography of Hannibal, but I have always referred to my copy of: The Punic Wars by Brian Caven published in 1980 by Weinfield & Nicolson, London. I notice another “popular history” introduction, published Feb 2020 by Captivating History & Matt Clayton: “The Punic Wars: A Captivating Guide to the First, Second, and Third Punic Wars Between Rome and Carthage, Including the Rise and Fall of Hannibal Barca”
